thread.title: Andy Murray eases past American Steve Johnson in Shanghai - Richmond and Twickenham Times
thread.title_full: Andy Murray eases past American Steve Johnson in Shanghai - Richmond and Twickenham Times - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Richmond and Twickenham Times
title: Andy Murray eases past American Steve Johnson in Shanghai - Richmond and Twickenham Times
text:
Andy Murray is safely through to the last 16 of the Shanghai Rolex Masters after a routine straight sets victory over American Steve Johnson. The Briton looked comfortable in his first appearance since guiding Great Britain into the Davis Cup final breaking Johnson's serve twice in the first set - the second break clinching the set 6-2.
 Richmond and Twickenham Times.
